archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.3.5: Malware protection software should be distributed automatically, within defined timescales, to reduce the likelihood of systems being exposed to the most recent malware (including those that are associated with zero-day attacks).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
